name: An Autumn Stroll
description:
Take a stroll through an Autumn wood with your camera in a Pokemon Snap-inspired title. Sit back and relax :) 

Windows Build Included Below 

Controls:

LMB - Take Photo

W/S - (Hold) Speed Up/Down

W/D - Switch Paths (When Prompted)

Tab - Open Photo Book

A/D - Go Through Photos

Created in a weekend for the Cozy Fall Jam 2022

Assets:

  1. Animal Models - Quirky Mega Series
  2. Nature Assets - Toon Fantasy Nature
  3. Font - Autumn Rats
